articles.content: How hot a commodity does Stephen King remain in Hollywood? Hot enough that there are at least two movies being released in 2022 based on books by King which have already been adapted for the screen. … [+5211 chars]

articles.title: Priyanka Chopra and Nick Jonas 'could not be happier' to have daughter home after 100 days in NICU - Daily Mail
articles.description: Nick and Priyanka could not be happier to have their little girl at home with them,' a source told Us Weekly.
articles.content: After dealing with the stress of their newborn daughter being born 12 weeks early, via surrogate and spending her first 100 days on Planet Earth in the NICU (newborn intensive care unit), Nick Jonas … [+5123 chars]
